root.name: Mars: War Logs
root.description: OverviewMars: War Logs is an RPG set on Mars. The game was released for PC on April 24, 2013; the game was later released via both Xbox Live Marketplace and PlayStation Network.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP SP3/ Windows Vista SP2/ Windows 7/ Windows 8Processor: AMD/INTEL DUAL-CORE 2.2 GHZRAM Memory: 2 GBGraphics Card: 512 MB 100% DIRECTX 9 AND SHADERS 4.0 COMPATIBLE ATI RADEON HD 4830/NVIDIA GEFORCE 8800 GT OR HIGHERHard Disk Space: 3 GBSound Card: DIRECTX 9

similar_games.game: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
